question: 拡がる
sourceMnemonic: Because the hiragana ends with an <ja>う</ja> sound, you know this word is a verb. The kanji itself means <kanji>extend</kanji> so the verb vocab version is <vocabulary>to extend</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: Does the kanji look familiar, kind of like <ja>広い</ja>, perhaps? This word shares the same reading as <ja>広い</ja>, and the meanings are kind of similar too! That means <ja>拡がる</ja> is read as <ja><reading>ひろがる</reading></ja>.
